data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kankan, Guinea. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kankan, Guinea
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Kankan, Guinea be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kankan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kankan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Maninka, Eastern people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, encourage the 13,984 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,972,500 citizens of Kankan, Guinea, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Kankan, Guinea by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Kankan
location.people_groups_list: Wassulu, Maninka, Konyanka, Toma, Manya, Mandingo, Kuranko
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Wassulu (82,000), Maninka, Konyanka (263,000), Toma (245,000), Manya, Mandingo (83,000), Kuranko (112,000)
